description.value:
Heroic Membership: Your adventures have earned you a unique place in a powerful organization. Check the box next to one of the following options and cross the other off your Chronicle Sheet.

□ Lacunafex Membership You have been adopted into the Lacunafex spy network and have access to the following feats and spells:

  • Feats: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Different Worlds]{Different Worlds}, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Reveal Machinations]{Reveal Machinations}, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Silver's Refrain]{Silver's Refrain}, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Tweak Appearances]{Tweak Appearances}.
  • Spells: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Exchange Image]{Exchange Image}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Join Pasts]{Join Pasts}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Silver's Refrain]{Silver's Refrain}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Spiritual Anamnesis]{Spiritual Anamnesis}.

□ Bellflower Membership You are a member of the Bellflower Network and gain access to the @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.Bellflower Tiller]{Bellflower Tiller} archetype, its associated feats, and the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Bellflower Toolbelt]{Bellflower Toolbelt}.
